enemies.name: Octorok
enemies.notes: Overworld. Walks, shoots rocks in 4 dirs. Common early enemy.

enemies.name: Moblin
enemies.notes: Overworld. Walks toward player, throws spears. Medium difficulty.

enemies.name: Keese
enemies.notes: Caves/palaces. Erratic flying pattern. Weak but annoying.

enemies.name: Stalfos
enemies.notes: Palaces. Walks and sword attacks. Can block with shield.

enemies.name: Tektite
enemies.notes: Overworld/mountain. Hops in arc pattern.

enemies.name: Leever
enemies.notes: Desert. Emerges from sand, moves toward player.

enemies.name: Zora
enemies.notes: Water. Surfaces, shoots fireball, submerges. Cannot be hit underwater.

enemies.name: Darknut
enemies.notes: Palaces. Heavy armor, shield blocks frontal attacks. Must hit from behind/side.

enemies.name: IronKnuckle
enemies.notes: Late palaces. Like Darknut but tougher. Throws sword at half HP.

enemies.name: Wizzrobe
enemies.notes: Palaces. Teleports, shoots magic beams. Only vulnerable briefly.

enemies.name: BubbleRed
enemies.notes: Palaces. Invincible bouncing skull. Contact disables sword temporarily.

enemies.name: BubbleBlue
enemies.notes: Palaces. Contact re-enables sword. Cures red bubble effect.

enemies.name: BossHorsehead
enemies.notes: Palace 1 boss. Charges, swings mace. Hit head to damage.

enemies.name: BossHelmethead
enemies.notes: Palace 2 boss. Heads detach and float. Hit body.

enemies.name: BossRebonack
enemies.notes: Palace 3 boss. Iron Knuckle on horseback, then dismounts.

enemies.name: BossCarock
enemies.notes: Palace 4 boss. Wizard, teleports + magic. Reflect spell needed.

enemies.name: BossGooma
enemies.notes: Palace 5 boss. Large beast, charges and throws boulders.

enemies.name: BossBarba
enemies.notes: Palace 6 boss. Dragon, emerges from lava pits.

enemies.name: BossThunderbird
enemies.notes: Great Palace mini-boss. Flying, invulnerable until Thunder spell reveals weak point.

enemies.name: BossDarkLink
enemies.notes: Great Palace final boss. Mirrors player's moves. Must find pattern.

behavior_ids.0: WALK_AND_SHOOT — walks randomly, shoots projectile toward player
behavior_ids.1: WALK_AND_CHARGE — walks toward player, melee attack
behavior_ids.3: WALK_AND_BLOCK — walks, attacks, can block with shield
behavior_ids.5: EMERGE_AND_CHASE — emerges from ground, chases player
behavior_ids.6: SURFACE_AND_SHOOT — surfaces from water, shoots, submerges
behavior_ids.8: ARMORED_AGGRESSIVE — like 7 but throws projectile at half HP
behavior_ids.9: TELEPORT_AND_SHOOT — teleports, shoots from new position
behavior_ids.10: BOUNCE_CURSE — invincible, bouncing, contact curses (no sword)
behavior_ids.11: BOUNCE_CURE — invincible, bouncing, contact cures curse
behavior_ids.128+: BOSS_* — unique boss patterns (see individual boss notes)

drop_tables.0: DROPS_COMMON — hearts, small magic, rarely rupees
drop_tables.1: DROPS_MEDIUM — hearts, magic, rupees, rarely bombs
drop_tables.2: DROPS_RARE — good chance of rupees, bombs, magic jars
drop_tables.3: DROPS_VALUABLE — high chance of large magic, rupees, bombs
drop_tables.4: DROPS_BOSS — heart container + item (fixed per palace)
